member.name: M:Donglisoft.Common.Encryption.#ctor(System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm)
member.remarks: 使用自定义SymmetricAlgorithm类的构造器.

member.name: M:Donglisoft.Common.Encryption.GetLegalKey(System.String)
member.remarks: Depending on the legal key size limitations of a specific CryptoService provider and length of the private key provided, padding the secret key with space character to meet the legal size of the algorithm.
